basejump
  • Reference

Sanitize Row Data

Coerce Ensembl rowData to a data.frame, and drop any nested list columns (e.g. entrezID). Nested columns will fail to write to disk as CSVs.

sanitizeRowData(object)

Arguments

object

Object.

Value

data.frame, without any nested list columns.

Details

Supports GRanges, data.frame, and DataFrame objects.

See also

Other Sanitization Functions: collapseToString, fixNA, removeNA, sanitizeSampleData

Examples

# Genes ====
x <- makeGRangesFromEnsembl(
    organism = "Homo sapiens",
    format = "genes",
    genomeBuild = "GRCh37"
)
#> Loading required package: EnsDb.Hsapiens.v75
#> Loading required package: ensembldb
